languages.text: {n}Маражай внимательно всматривается вам в лицо. Потом качает головой.{/n} "Напрасно. Напрасно, {name}. Столь доверчиво обнажать душу кому-то вроде меня? Тебе повезло, что я не имею намерения сломать тебя здесь и сейчас — иначе бы подобная слабость дорого обошлась тебе".

{n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай внимательно всматривается вам в лицо. Потом качает головой.{/n} "Напрасно. Напрасно, {name}. Столь доверчиво обнажать душу кому-то вроде меня? Тебе повезло, что я не имею намерения сломать тебя здесь и сейчас — иначе бы подобная слабость дорого обошлась тебе".

You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

{n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

{n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋仔细端详着你的表情，随后摇了摇头。{/n}“多么愚不可及的坦诚，{name}。你竟然如此信任我，愿意向我这样的人袒露心声？你应该感到庆幸，我此时此刻无意毁了你——否则，如此自曝其短，必将让你付出惨痛的代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋仔细端详着你的表情，随后摇了摇头。{/n}“多么愚不可及的坦诚，{name}。你竟然如此信任我，愿意向我这样的人袒露心声？你应该感到庆幸，我此时此刻无意毁了你——否则，如此自曝其短，必将让你付出惨痛的代价。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai escudriña tu rostro, y luego niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Qué insensatez. Admitirlo ha sido una insensatez, {name}. ¿Tan {mf|cándido|cándida} eres que desnudas tu alma sin ningún pudor ante alguien como yo? Tienes suerte de que no quiera someterte aquí y ahora; de lo contrario, esa debilidad te habría costado cara».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai escudriña tu rostro, y luego niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Qué insensatez. Admitirlo ha sido una insensatez, {name}. ¿Tan {mf|cándido|cándida} eres que desnudas tu alma sin ningún pudor ante alguien como yo? Tienes suerte de que no quiera someterte aquí y ahora; de lo contrario, esa debilidad te habría costado cara».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage et hoche la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Quelle bêtise... Vous ne devriez pas admettre cela, {name}. Dévoiler ainsi vos pensées, me faites-vous donc confiance à ce point ? Vous avez de la chance, car je n'ai pas l'intention de vous anéantir en cet instant précis. Mais cette faiblesse aurait pu vous coûter très, très cher. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous dévisage et hoche la tête d'un air désapprobateur.{/n} « Quelle bêtise... Vous ne devriez pas admettre cela, {name}. Dévoiler ainsi vos pensées, me faites-vous donc confiance à ce point ? Vous avez de la chance, car je n'ai pas l'intention de vous anéantir en cet instant précis. Mais cette faiblesse aurait pu vous coûter très, très cher. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mustert dein Gesicht und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Töricht. Ein törichtes Eingeständnis, {name}. Vertraut Ihr so sehr, dass Ihr Eure Seele jemandem wie mir entblößen würdet? Welch Glück Ihr habt, dass ich nicht vorhabe, Euch hier und jetzt zu brechen – sonst würde Euch diese Schwäche teuer zu stehen kommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mustert dein Gesicht und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Töricht. Ein törichtes Eingeständnis, {name}. Vertraut Ihr so sehr, dass Ihr Eure Seele jemandem wie mir entblößen würdet? Welch Glück Ihr habt, dass ich nicht vorhabe, Euch hier und jetzt zu brechen – sonst würde Euch diese Schwäche teuer zu stehen kommen."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはあなたの顔をしっかり見てから首を横に振る。{/n}「愚かだ。愚かな告白だな、{name}。俺のような者に魂をさらけ出すほど信頼を寄せているというのか？俺が今ここでお前を打ち砕くつもりがなかったのは幸いだったな。そうじゃなきゃ、その弱さが高くついていただろうよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはあなたの顔をしっかり見てから首を横に振る。{/n}「愚かだ。愚かな告白だな、{name}。俺のような者に魂をさらけ出すほど信頼を寄せているというのか？俺が今ここでお前を打ち砕くつもりがなかったのは幸いだったな。そうじゃなきゃ、その弱さが高くついていただろうよ」

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, . Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünü dikkatle inceleyip kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Aptalca... Aptalca bir itiraf bu {name}. Benim gibi birisine yüreğini açacak kadar inanıyor musun? Seni burada hemencecik parçalama niyetinde olmadığım için şanslısın. Aksi hâlde böylesi bir zayıflığın bedelini ağır öderdin."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scrutinises your face, then shakes his head.{/n} "Foolish. A foolish admission, {name}. Are you so trusting that you would bare your soul to someone like me? You are lucky I have no intention of breaking you here and now — otherwise such weakness would cost you dearly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünü dikkatle incelemesinin ardından kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Aptalca... Aptalca bir itiraf bu {name}. Benim gibi birisine yüreğini açacak kadar inanıyor musun? Seni burada hemencecik parçalama niyetinde olmadığım için şanslısın. Aksi hâlde böylesi bir zayıflığın bedelini ağır öderdin."
